entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 7:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -28.5°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
